text: "Emergency on Planet Earth" is a 1993 song by British funk band Jamiroquai and is the title track to their debut studio album of the same name. It went to number 14 in the United Kingdom and number 4 on the Billboard Dance Club Songs chart in the United States. ==Track listing== * UK CD single # "Emergency on Planet Earth" – 3:39 # "Emergency on Planet Earth" (extended version) – 4:12 # "If I Like It, I Do It" (acoustic) – 4:26 # "Revolution 1993" (demo) – 10:19 ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:Jamiroquai songs
title: Emergency on Planet Earth (song)
